field.label: Enabled
field.help: This will enable or disable the ACL.

field.label: Type
field.help: Set the type for this domain.

field.label: Master IP
field.help: Set the IP address of master server when using slave mode.

field.label: Domain Name
field.help: Set the name for this ACL.

field.label: Allow Transfer
field.help: Define an ACL where you allow which server can retrieve your zone.

field.label: Allow Query
field.help: Define an ACL where you allow which client are allowed to query this domain.

field.label: TTL
field.help: Set the general TTL for this domain.

field.label: Mail Admin
field.help: Set the mail address of domain admin. Please replace @ with a dot.

field.label: DNS Server
field.help: Set the DNS Server hosting this file. This should be the FQDN of your Firewall.
